website_summaries.verdict: With excellent design and comprehensive print software, the reasonably priced Brother P-touch Cube prints several sizes and colors of good-quality plastic (laminated) labels from your iOS or Android mobile device.
pros: Comprehensive, easy-to-use label design and print mobile app
Strong selection of label types in several color schemes, including fabric iron-on labels
Runs on AC or battery power
cons: Cannot use with Windows or Mac PCs

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs power adapter
customer_reviews.text: Works great but eats batteries and mains adapter difficult to get hold of. Very convenient and does the job but come on Brother UK make the mains adapter freely available. Not everyone needs to print while in the car !!!
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: So if you have an android device this will be so easy to use. Few minutes to pair the printer with your phone over Bluetooth and download the brother app. Next time you want to use it just open the app and you areready to print. If have iPhone iPad then you will have to go to Bluetooth settings in your phone’s settings every single time you want to use the printer. It also works great on iOS but a pain to always connect the printer before use. This printer however doesn’t work with PC or macOS. Would be nice to edit labels on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good - be prepared to also buy a slightly unusual AC/DC transformer as well
customer_reviews.text: These are a good option to use with a smart phone. Definitely better than models with keyboards. A better range of options for similar price. Would be better if cane with an AC DC adapter. Note that it requires a bit of a specialised one. Available, but double check before buying. It is meant to have batteries, which means it takes up more space than if it was simply plugged in. I guess that would be important for some people, just not me.
customer_reviews.author: London Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 13 year old. It was less than rrp and I bought a pack of no brand labels. Easy app and hassle free. Runs on Mains or batteries. Bought this one as you can buy fabric ribbon to print on, which is an added bonus for something special. Everyone happy.
customer_reviews.author: Wease

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Everything needs a label
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Everything needs a label!!! Was delivered quickly. Disappointed no mains plug came with it. Also would have been helpful to have a spare tape.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Life is labelled.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this printer. It’s easy to set up. It works well with the app and can print in many fonts. Sizes and on multiple tape materials, colours and textures.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. A. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for purpose. Swift shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know if it would be good enough but should have realised a Brother product would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Brother P300BT label maker
customer_reviews.text: Great product works with an app from your mobile phone giving you lots of choices for label design, font and colour. Batteries last a reasonable amount of time. Lots of choice of tapes size and colour.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Hazelgrove

customer_reviews.title: Great but there’s a wish list.
customer_reviews.text: Greta piece of kit, excellent for any labelling you need. Nice and portable. Very well made. Wish list: Wish it would work with a PC as well and mobile app. Wish the Bluetooth would simply connect to the app when you turn the unit on rather than clicking a few buttons in the app first. Wish it had a lipo battery or used less cells. Wish the Brother tape wasn’t soooo expensive!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hills

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The way the machine was design will waste about an inch of your tape every time you print a label, and you cannot change it through setting. Therefore I would not recommend this machine. Further information can be found by Googling “tape waste” or ‘label wate”.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Law

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this label printer, it has so many possibilities. I ordered the fabric ribbon from amazon.com, which was reasonably priced and arrived in good time. This will really make my Christmas gifts a really nice personal touch this year.
customer_reviews.author: Meem

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I could print from my mobile easily round the house. After only printing 12 labels the batteries run out - so I now need to buy a power supply cable. If you have the same idea as me for purchase then think again or you'll be for ever needing batteries. Also wastes a lot of the tape each time it prints so I have to then use scissors to trim the label. Pretty average at best!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to use, loads of ways to customise, good app with it. Adhesion good too for wood/plastic/glass etc. Used it to organise kitchen, bedroom storage boxes and folders of paperwork so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This device won’t work due to battery issues. Buying a power pack to remedy further 10 quid
customer_reviews.text: Like many reviewers - think the device makes a great little solution - but the battery issues makes it unusable! It gets halfway through printing label, stops and the app shows a device malfunction as battery low. Brand new batteries makes no difference. Shame on Brother for not recalling or correcting this long standing problem.
customer_reviews.author: Liselore Kolff

customer_reviews.title: P-Touch Cube Label Printer!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got this P-Touch Cube Label Printer, and I can't wait to use it! So much worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Melek

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant, I would recommend buying the adapter as well rather that use batteries.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Eynon

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Label Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great label printer, Bluetooth & app make it a dream to work with, be warned does not come with mains plug, bseems to be good on batteries. Bought mains lead for €10 for back up.
customer_reviews.author: Tank Twomey Cork Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Fatally flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Poor connectivity it is unable to connect to my PC or Mac. If I connect my Apple Keyboard to my iPad the PT300 does not allow it to be used even though other apps do. A nicely designed product with fatal flawa. I intend to return it
customer_reviews.author: P.B.H.Horbury

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the labelling of small items. Very versatile
customer_reviews.author: McCat

customer_reviews.title: Missing AC adaptor and support line closed.
customer_reviews.text: 1. There is no AC adaptor in the box. 2. Call support line today 2:10 PM Thu, voice said that the line is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product *****
customer_reviews.text: Great printer for a small business or home use. Really easy to set up and great variety of texts and designs love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: emma parry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Printer!
customer_reviews.text: Where to start! It’s been used on everything in the house and the office... labelling food jars, folders, stationeries, postal addresses. I own a lot of media equipment for my work and needed it to have the company name on there so this was the perfect printer! I recommend getting the black tape with gold writing, looks so slick! Add it in without thinking!
customer_reviews.author: Prash Photo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Great for small business owners. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Nick Gregg

product_meta.title: Brother PT-P300BT Label Maker, Bluetooth, P-Touch 'CUBE' Label Printer, Portable, Up to 12 mm Labels, Includes 12 mm Black on White Tape Cassette
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Without additional batteries

The P-touch Cube Brother label printer is compact, stylish and seamlessly connects to your family’s smartphones and tablets using Bluetooth. All label editing is done using the Design and Print app – a free download for iOS and Android. Unleash your creativity, and produce personalised labels in a wide choice of colours and sizes for use all around your home. Choose from over 1,000 symbols and emojis, 23 fonts, and 61 frames to include with your text.




The Brother P-Touch Cube is our clever, compact and stylish label printer that’s perfect for people who want to create custom labels for lots of little jobs from organising their home to personalising gifts for friends and family. The compact and stylish new Bluetooth home label printer that lets you design and print labels straight from your Apple and Android smartphone and tablet.




It’s easy to use and can quickly produce durable and colourful labels up to 12 mm in width. Fridge, freezer and dishwasher safe, the labels are ready to be used just about anywhere.



BOX CONTAINS


 * 1 x Brother PT-P300BT label printer 
 * 1 x Warranty card
 * 1 x Set-up guide
 * 1 x Inbox tape: 12 mm black on white TZe tape (4 m)
feature_bullets: RIBBONS AND LABELS: Print customised, durable labels or personalised ribbons up to 12 mm wide. Add customised messages in a variety of motifs, styles and colours. You can also print tapes in a variety of widths including 6 mm, 9 mm or 12 mm
PORTABLE USE: This app connected label printer is battery operated for portable use around your home.

FREE APP: Using the free Brother Design and Print app create custom designs with thousands of symbols, emojis, font styles and frames. You can even create designs whilst on the move and print when you get home
HOME ORGANISATION: Keep the home organised with bespoke label designs. Make important information stand out with multiple label colours available or just even add some colour to your home
PERFECT FOR: Identification labels, storage labels, files and folder labels, school uniform name labels, food labels, freezer labels, plant labels, gift wrapping and wedding stationery
